title: What are some examples of etiology myths? - Quora

response.answer_text: I copied my answer from another question, I hope you don't mind! My area of study is really centered around Classical mythology so that’s what I’m pulling these from. Some of them are: The myth of Zeus’s lightning bolts is used to explain why there is lightning. Spiders create beautiful spider webs because the first spider was a woman named Arachne who was a skilled weaver. There is a rock formation in Mt. Sipylus in Greece called the “weeping rock” that looks like a woman; the Greeks said that a woman named Niobe turned to stone after her 14 children were slaughtered by Artemis and Apollo. The origin of the universe as told by literally every civilization. The rainbow was caused by the goddess Iris. There are so many more! These are just the ones that I could come up with off the top of my head
